name: todo-typescript
description: A todo application written in typescript. The application is a command line application. The application will display list of tasks, allow new tasks to be created, and allow existing tasks to be marked as completed. There will also be a filter to include already completed tasks in the list.
author: Elom Atsou Agboka <opentech.consult@gmail.com> (https://github.com/OpenTechConsult)
